about_the_game:
If you already own the standard game, extend your experience of the critically acclaimed Metroidvania with the Complete Upgrade Pack.

The Complete Upgrade Pack includes:
• Mask of Darkness Story DLC
• Two Thrones outfit
• Dark Prince outfit
• Immortals outfit
• Prosperity Bird amulet
• Fariba's Notebook digital art book
detailed_description:
If you already own the standard game, extend your experience of the critically acclaimed Metroidvania with the Complete Upgrade Pack.

short_description: If you already own the standard game, extend your experience of the critically acclaimed Metroidvania with the Complete Upgrade Pack, including the Mask of Darkness Story DLC, 3 outfits for Sargon, the Prosperity Bird Amulet, and a digital art book.
